document.full_text: portugal's social democrats are favorites to win a general election on sunday, but celebrations could be short as they face the urgent task of forming a coalition government to enact a demanding bailout plan.
document.title: portugal vote winner to face daunting job under bailout
lines_and_colors: portugal's social democrats are favorites to win a general election on sunday, but celebrations could be short as they face the urgent task of forming a coalition government to enact a demanding bailout plan.
